svg.title: Documentation Intelligence Operation - Strategic Knowledge Transformation System
svg.desc: Comprehensive intelligence gathering workflow transforming scattered documentation into organized, AI-optimized knowledge systems through systematic collection, analysis, optimization, and deployment with real-time metrics and team collaboration
